message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a one-time offer of $12000 for it. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I'm willing to pay $10000 for it, which I believe is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price. What do you think?

I understand your position, Alice. While I would like to stay within my budget, I am willing to consider $11500 for the product. This still allows me to stay within my financial limits while acknowledging your offer.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $13000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is the lowest I can go and still make a profit. What do you think?
I see your position, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $12500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $12800. This is the best I can do without sacrificing my profit margin. Can you meet me at this price?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in finding a middle ground. Based on my budget, I am willing to pay $12750 for the product. I hope this aligns with your needs.
I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $12900. This is the highest I can go without losing money on the deal. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $12850 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.

I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm going to have to make a tough decision here. I'm going to sell the product to John for $8000. It's not the best deal, but it's better than walking away empty-handed. Good luck with your search for the product.
